Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the restriction on Republican colleagues from entering the SCIF during the closed-door depositions. Both Democrats and Republicans had access to the SCIF and participated in the proceedings.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Republican committee members were present during the closed-door depositions and had the opportunity to ask questions.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it fails to provide evidence or specific instances where Republican colleagues were denied access to the SCIF.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Republican colleagues were excluded from the closed-door proceedings without sufficient evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, as transcripts and testimonies show that Republican committee members were present and actively participated in the closed-door depositions.
